overview.en: EasyOption.io is a worldwide shared Cryptocurrency Options Trading Platform. Meanwhile, it is a tokenized and community-based autonomous organization. All people owning EOPT have power to decide the platform in the future.
overview.zh: EasyOptioin.io 是一个全世界共享的数字货币期权交易平台，同时也是一个用Token构建的社区型自治组织。所有EOPT的持有者将共同参与决策平台的未来。
